I just added the ship info. as part of the Trainer origin, it could be a pr=
ototype of the same ship, or it could have been an early model that was lat=
er advanced and eventually got the technology from somewhere.

The Vile Can=
non struck the shields shorting out the generator powering it. Three more a=
nchors snapped and the base rocked into the air and crashed down causing a =
gust of sand to rise through the air. 

Inside the base Ignatius fell from =
his seat and struck the console with a loud clang. his head was dented but =
other than that he was fine. He regained his composure trying to think of a=
 way out of the predicament. The only solution was surender.

"This is the =
Trainer Base, I offer you my unconditional surrender." He turned down the a=
utomatic defenses and released the blast doors making no obstacle to stop t=
he attackers from entering.

Shots from everywhere struck the Trainer Base =
causing stress fractures in the frame. Ignatius didn't know that there were=
 two forces outside he just knew that if his choices were death or surrende=
r he chose to live.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasi=
s@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 10:1=
9 AM
  Subject: Re: ATTACK!



  The ship may have looked like the one blaz=
e had saw but this one was much 
  different and more advanced by far. The =
ship she may have seen was the 
  prototype for the ship since none of the =
ships from her future has transwarp 
  warpgate technology(Im only guessing=
 so dont yell at me if im wrong. ::Hides 
  under a rock just in case::)Vil=
e laughed evily as the dozen autoguns fired on 
  the Violator, the ship ro=
cked slightly from the dozen or so blasts before the 
  ship opened fire ag=
ain with a total of six Mega cannon blasts, 8 laser 
  blasts, 4 photon tor=
pedoes, two Mega missiles. About this time the Vile Can 
  had finished cha=
rging and the energy around the cannon crackled wildly with 
  energy. 

  =
Methos: "Vile, the Vile cannon is charged and ready to open fire!" 

  Vile=
: "Open fire then!" 

  And with that said Methos pressed a larged red butt=
on and the massive ship 
  began to tremble wildly as the large cannon open=
ed fire sending a massive 
  beam at the Trainers base, all the fire power =
heading directly to where the 
  firepower hit the last time. As this happe=
ned Cyanide flew higher into the 
  sky before he unleashed another 3 beams=
 of energized acid at the trainers 
  base.
